00009 // File: Age_Map.h
00010 //
00011 // Age_Map is a class that holds a set of age-specific ranged values
00012 // The age ranges must be mutually exclusive.
00013 //
00014 
00015 #ifndef _FRED_AGEMAP_H
00016 #define _FRED_AGEMAP_H
00017 
00018 #include "Global.h"
00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <vector>
00021 #include <string>
00022 
00023 #include "Params.h"
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 class Age_Map {
00028 public:
00029   // Creation operations
00030   Age_Map(string Name);
00031   Age_Map();
00032   
00033   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_num_ages() const { return ages.size(); }
00034   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL bool is_empty() const { return ages.empty(); }
00035   
00036   // Additional creation operations for building an Age_Map
00037   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void read_from_input(string Input);
00038   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void add_value(int lower_age, int upper_age, double val);
00039   
00040   // Operations
00041   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL double find_value(int age) const;
00042   
00043   // Utility functions
00044   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void print() const;
00045   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL bool quality_control() const;
00046   
00047 private:
00048   string Name;
00049   vector < vector<int> > ages;  // vector to hold the age ranges
00050   vector <double> values;       // vector to hold the values for each age range
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif
